org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.translators
Interface DatabaseTranslator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicTranslator, DB2Translator, DerbyTranslator, HSQLDBTranslator, MSSQLTranslator, MySQLTranslator, OracleTranslator, PostgresTranslator
public interface DatabaseTranslator

Defines a database translator method which translates DDL and SQL between databases

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski@gmail.com)

Method Detail

handlesDB

String handlesDB()
Returns:
the database constant for the DB handled by this translator

makeAutoIdQuery

String makeAutoIdQuery(String tableName,
                       String idColumnName)
Parameters:
tableName - the name of the table which the row was inserted into
idColumnName - the name of the id column
Returns:
the query to get the auto generated id of the last insert

makeLimitQuery

String makeLimitQuery(String sql,
                      long start,
                      long limit,
                      String tableName)
Parameters:
sql - any SELECT query
start - the row to start on
limit - the maximum number of rows to return
tableName - the name of the table which the query was executed on
Returns:
the SELECT based on the original with limits applied
